title: a crazy trade for a crazy card
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: a crazy trade for a crazy card
posts.post_content:
ok i have this incredibly miscut Hoffman T205. I am looking for any of the following in trade:

miscut T205 Cubs
miscut T206 White Six
miscut Hal Chase
signed 1933 Goudey
or, as always... M116 Mordecai Brown

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=55917&d=1328321631[/IMG]
Very cool, would if I had anything.
Sean......very sweet miscut!!:D....i don't collect goldies but, if i were u, id hold onto that one;)
thanks guys for the responses. let me know what you have to trade :)
